description:
Protecting systems, networks and programs from digital attacks is nowadays a challenge, mostly when you're speaking about the fintech world. Attackers are getting more inventive and companies need to be more efficient to resist to cyberattacks.
In this session we'll be discussing current and future challenges of security and you're invited to join! 
This short conference will take place as part of ICPC World Finals, gathering national and international speakers to discuss the future of tech talent and skills.
Join us to be part of the discussion, but also to meet the ICPC community.

AGENDA
16:00-16:10 - Opening and welcome
16:10-16:40 - How Coding, Ethical Hacking and Regulations work together to save money? by Euronext

Paulo de Carvalho Martins, Head of Euronext Information Security Governance, Risk and compliance
Duarte Monteiro, Head of Euronext Information Security assessment and exploitation team

16:40-17:00 - My hacking journey

André Baptista, Most Valuable Hacker in the world by H1-202 - confirmed

17:00-17:30 – Cybersecurity with Natixis

Speaker: Ibrahim Hajjeh, Security Expert Leader & Operational Manager

17:30-18:00 – Closing Session
name: Cybersecurity - When data is money
